AppraisalItemId.description: The appraisal item that's associated with the appraisal source valuation.

AverageConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's average condition.

CleanConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's in clean condition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The autopopulated name of Appraisal Item Provider Valuation record.

ProviderName.description: The name of the provider that gives the valuation of the item.

RoughConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's in rough condition.

ValuationDateTime.description: The date and time when the source gives the valuation of the item.
